attributes.action: TOUGHEN LAWS ON THE YOBS WHO DESTROY OTHERS PROPERTY PER THE MINDLESS RIOTS.
attributes.additional_details:
WE THE UNDERSIGNED WOULD LIKE THE GOVERNMENT TO TOUGHEN THE PENALTIES ON THE ACTIONS OF MINDLESS THUGS/YOBS AS FOLLOWS, THE ONES WHO ARE STILL UNDER CONTROL OF THERE PARENTS THE PARENTS SHOULD BE MADE TO PAY SOME IF NOT ALL BACK TO THE VICTIMS, THE ONES WHO ARE ADULTS SHOULD KNOW BETTER AND SHOULD HAVE THE SAME, IT DOES NOT WORK SLAPPING THERE HANDS OR SOFT PRISON SPELLS, HURT PEOPLE WHERE IT REALLY  HURTS IN THERE POCKETS, PARENTS SHOULD KNOW WHAT THERE CHILDREN ARE UP TO AND WHERE NOT THE POLICE OR GOVERNMENT, PRAISE MUST GO OUT TO OUR EMERGENCY SERVICES 100%, THE ONES CAUSING THESE RIOTS ARE ONLY AFTER FREE GOODS AND LEAVING PEOPLE HOMELESS BY ARSON, ALSO SITES SUCH AS TWITTER WHERE THERE INCITE TROUBLE SHOULD BE TAKEN DOWN AS THIS IS NOT THE PURPOSE OF THEM.

LETS HOPE THIS IS LOOKED INTO AT SOME STAGE.
